thread.section_title: The Pierre, A Taj Hotel, New York - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Dated but premium
thread.title_full: Dated but premium - Review of The Pierre, A Taj Hotel, New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: SunshineLouisville
title: Dated but premium
text: Hotel staff is everywhere. Someone to push elevator button and multiple greeters at every corner. Security is tight. I attended a conference and the meeting rooms are clean but really gaudy and dated. Food was good. Service was good. Very expensive. Overall a nice place for a business meeting but hotel needs a facelift.
